__TOC__
Special moves are passive and active abilities which can be unlocked when you have 80 skill in certain combat skills and anatomy

==Fencing==
===Paralyzing Blow===
Spears have a passive chance to strike a Paralyzing Blow on a target, locking them in place for a short period of time. Anatomy is factored into your chance to hit a Paralyzing Blow: (Anatomy / 100) * (Paralyzing Blow Base Chance).

==Mace Fighting==
===Crushing Blow===
Two handed mace weapons have a passive chance to provide 150% damage, significantly reduce stamina, and damage your target's armor. Anatomy is factored into your chance to hit a Crushing Blow: (Anatomy / 100) * (Crushing Blow Base Chance).

==Swordsmanship==
===Concussion Blow===
Axes have a passive chance to strike a Concussion Blow on a target, which reduces target's intelligence by half for 15 seconds. Anatomy is factored into your chance to hit a Concussion Blow: (Anatomy / 100) * (Concussion Blow Base Chance).

==Wrestling==
===Stun & Disarm===
The only two usable spell moves are [[Stun]] and [[Disarm]] which are dependent upon [[Wrestling]]. Stun is used to lock a target in place, unable to cast spells or move. Disarm is used to disarm an opponent for a short period of time. Special Moves can be accessed through your client assistance program by setting a hotkey for that skill, or through the client itself through Settings > Macros > New macro > Add:

[[File:Special_Moves_Stun_Disarm_Macro_Preview.PNG]]

==Overdive Notes==
Stun is NOT available on [[Overdrive|Overdrive Server]]:
